column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A------ man drove a Mazda into a sewage canal
column4: damaging the vehicle.------The accident happened at 9 pm on March 11
column5: 2020 along National Road 4 in Kantan village
column8: Phnom Penh.------According to people at the scene
column9: the Mazda was driving along National Road 4 in the westbound lane when it crashed into the ditch. The owner of the vehicle immediately fled the scene
column10: leaving the vehicle behind.------After the incident
column13: came down to the scene and contacted the registered owners of the vehicle to take it for repairs. ------TVFB
